Name: Dig 2
Description: Reveal the top 2 Landscape cards from your space

Name: Dig 3
Description: Reveal the top 3 Landscape cards from your space

Name: Survey
Description: Choose a space adjacent (not diagonal) to you. Look at all of the Landscape cards there.

Name: Steal
Description: Steal an opponent's Equipment card. Trash this card.

Name: Trash
Description: Trash up to 3 cards from your draw pile and discard pile. Trash this card. Shuffle your deck.

Name: Tunnel
Description: If you are on a space lower than Topsoil, move to any space that is the same level as you.
